name: A King's Lament
description:
As you explore a ruined Byzantine castle on the sea, you discover that the former inhabitants of the castle never left. Wander the castle to discover their story and help them move on to the afterlife.

This game's story was inspired by the legend of the Kizkalesi castle in eastern Turkey, also known as the Maiden's Castle or the Castle on the Sea.

You may need to adjust your screen size to play the game.
